# ![LICENSE](data:image/svg+xml;base64,) LICENSE

## Copyright

```raw
PROPRIETARY

Copyright (c) 2025 ilkhoeri

All rights reserved.

This software and associated documentation files (the "Software") are provided
for use only under specific conditions. The Software may not be reproduced,
distributed, modified, or otherwise used in any form, for any purpose, without
the express written permission of the copyright holder. The Software is provided
"as is," without warranty of any kind, either express or implied, including
but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular
purpose, and non-infringement.

In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages,
or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort, or otherwise, arising from,
out of, or in connection with the Software or the use or other dealings in the Software.
```

[![© LICENSE](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-PROPRIETARY-blue)](https://github.com/ilkhoeri/messaging-app?tab=Proprietary-1-ov-file)

## Conclusion

---

1. **"All rights reserved"** – Emphasizes that all copyrights are protected and there is no right to distribute or modify except with explicit permission.
2. No permission to copy, modify, or distribute the code.
3. This license does not allow third parties to use, distribute, or sell the code without written permission.

With this license, full control over the distribution and use of the code is held by the developer, and otherwise, there is no right to use or share the code without explicit permission.
